Do I need any special hardware to use this?

@uggenabben: No, no special hardware required other than chipped or soft modded Wii ... You can play the .wbfs file directly from a FAT32 or NTFS partitioned USB drive ... or extract/convert .wbfs file to an .iso file and burn to disc if you prefer ... I recommend using Configurable USB Loader for playing/loading games (http://gbatemp.net/index.php?showtopic=147638)
